[id='understanding']
= Understanding {prodname}

:context: syndesis

{prodname} is an integration platform. With {prodname}, you
can obtain data from an
application or service, operate on that data if you need to, and then
send the
data to a completely different application or service.  No coding is
required to accomplish this.

For a high-level overview of {prodname}, see:

* <<how-it-works>>
* <<audience>>
* <<benefits>>
* <<understanding-terms>>
* <<planning>>
* <<workflow-overview>>
* <<how-you-use>>
ifeval::["{context}" == "ignite"]
* <<about-product-name_{context}>>
endif::[]
